availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Woodford County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Son of Joseph W. Harper and Elizabeth J. Harper. Married Elizabeth T. Norwood Harper in Woodford County on January 20, 1863. Resident of Woodford County in 1850. Farmer in Woodford County in 1860. Provost Marshal and recruiting officer in Midway during the Civil War.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Woodford County, District 1, p. 444B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Woodford County, p. 102.

KYR-0001-004-0182.
